templates.title: Monthly Subscription Audit & Kill-List
templates.description: A high-voltage system to identify, classify, and terminate wasted recurring expenses. Feel richer in under 30 minutes.

templates.title: Subscription Kill-List Protocol
templates.description: Ruthless financial triage. Identify parasitic recurring charges and sever the connection. High-speed audit mode enabled.

templates.title: Annual Financial Leak Map & Autonomous Kill Protocol
templates.description: God Mode financial control. Map yearly spending leaks, diagnose behavioral patterns, and install autonomous cancellation rules.

templates.title: Digital Paperwork Black Hole Eliminator
templates.description: A God Mode system to eliminate document chaos. Capture, classify, and retrieve paperwork without stress or repetition.

templates.title: Digital Estate Master Protocol
templates.description: GOD MODE. Secure your legacy. A classified system to organize assets, keys, and access for your designated Digital Executor. Prevent asset evaporation.

templates.title: Weekly System Defrag
templates.description: Resynchronize your reality. A rapid-fire protocol to clear mental RAM, purge physical caches, and align temporal vectors (calendar) for the week ahead.

templates.title: Life Admin Zero-Inbox Protocol
templates.description: A God Mode system to eliminate admin backlog. Force every incoming item into a decisive outcome and maintain permanent inbox zero.

templates.title: Habitat Integrity Protocol
templates.description: Defend your shelter against entropy. A quarterly engineering inspection of life support, filtration, and structural systems. Detect failures before they breach.

templates.title: Financial Leak Map & Kill Protocol
templates.description: A ruthless protocol to map your recurring expenses and terminate financial waste.

templates.title: Paperwork Incinerator
templates.description: The anti-hoarding protocol. Gather every scrap of paper, digitize the vital data, and shred the rest. Turn physical liabilities into digital zeros.

templates.title: Digital Asset Survivability Map
templates.description: A critical protocol to map your digital life and ensure your accounts can survive your absence.

templates.title: Emergency Protocol: God Mode
templates.description: Don't just plan for emergencies‚Äîdrill them. Includes live evacuation simulation.
